snippet: Documents released on Wednesday disclosed that an oil spill from a ruptured pipeline that fouled California beaches in the spring might have been far larger than projected.
abstract: Documents from Texas-based company Plains All American Pipeline indicate May oil spill from ruptured pipeline along California coast may have released 143,000 gallons into ocean; new figure is 40 percent higher than original estimate of 101,000 gallons.
lead_paragraph: Documents released on Wednesday disclosed that an oil spill from a ruptured pipeline that fouled California beaches in the spring might have been far larger than projected.

headline.main: California: Spring Oil Spill Estimate Grows
headline.print_headline: California: Spring Oil Spill Estimate Grows
